akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1704b. Repealed. Pub. L. 97–214, § 7(4), July 12, 1982, 96 Stat. 173
Section, Pub. L. 86–149, title IV, § 420, Aug. 10, 1959, 73 Stat. 324, related to utilization of foreign currencies for construction of military projects and reimbursement of Commodity Credit Corporation.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Oct. 1, 1982, and applicable to military construction projects, and to construction and acquisition of military family housing before, on, or after such date, see section 12(a) of Pub. L. 97–214, set out as an Effective Date note under section 2801 of Title 10, Armed Forces.
